description: Vocabulary lookup with direct Anki card creation Glosdalen is a language and knowledge lookup app that integrates seamlessly with AnkiDroid for efficient language learning. Key Features: • High-quality language lookup • Support for 30+ languages including German, Swedish, English, French, Spanish, Italian, and more • Direct Anki card creation with one tap Requirements: • AnkiDroid app installed for card creation • DeepL or Copilot API access Perfect for any language learning combination you need!
